alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 4:10PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Gosper and south central Dawson Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 410 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elwood, or 17 miles southwest of Lexington, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Elwood around 415 PM CDT. Johnson Lake around 425 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Lexington. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 227 and 242. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
